## Data and packages

We start with loading the packages we'll use.

```{r}
#| label: load-packages
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidytext)
```

```{r}
#| label: import-data

coursera_data <- read.csv("data/Coursera.csv")
udemy_data <- read.csv("data/Udemy.csv")
edx_data <- read.csv("data/edx.csv")
skillshare_data <- read.csv("data/skillshare.csv")
```
